com.lib_im.pro.ui.widget.swipe

类 LSwipeRefreshLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.lib_im.pro.ui.widget.swipe.LSwipeRefreshLayout
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingParent, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class LSwipeRefreshLayout
extends android.view.ViewGroup
implements android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingParent, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild
    下拉刷新控件 可在layout之前使用setHeader(com.lib_im.pro.ui.widget.swipe.SwipeView)添加自定义头部，若未设置，添加默认头部createHeader()

                                       LSwipeRefreshLayout.OnChildScrollUpCallback callback)
        设置后在 canChildScrollUp()中优先使用该方法判断能否下拉

      • changeTargetY

        public void changeTargetY(float y)
        开放给Swipe控件，用于改变主控件高度，不改变时效果类似google原生SwipeRefreshLayout
